name: Dropbox
description: Add a Dropbox Instance to connect your existing Dropbox account to the Cloud Storage and Documents Hub, allowing you to manage files and folders. You will need your Dropbox account information to add an instance.
configDescription: If you do not have an Dropbox account, you can create one at Dropbox Signup

configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter
configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector

configuration.name: Document Hub Tagging
configuration.description: Enable Tagging of Documents. Paths and Tags will be stored in CE database in Clear Text

configuration.name: Event Notification Subscription ID
configuration.description: The subscription ID for the webhook events subscription

configuration.name: Filter null values from the response
configuration.description: Used to enable/disable filtering of null values from the responses.

configuration.name: Default select fields
configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings

configuration.name: Event Notification Callback URL
configuration.description: An application callback URL used for event notifications from Dropbox and Cloud Elements, e.g., Uploaded Files, etc.

configuration.name: Callback Notification Signature Key
configuration.description: A key used to generate a validation hash header of the event/bulk notification webhook callback payload

configuration.name: Include Ref Id of File/Folder in Event
configuration.description: Send File Ref Id from DropBox in the Event Body

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

description.x-samplevalue: These properties describe how confidential this file or folder is.

Policies can be Confidential, Public or Internal.

resources.description: Delete the custom field template instance for a file
Create a custom fields for a file
